content: {"name": "NHA - Mayores Senior Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Required: Complete application, call 24 hours ahead\nto reserve a meal, suggested donation $2.50 per\nmeal", "email": "", "url": "https://nhainc.org/mayores-senior-center/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "2 Aurora L Gonzalez Drive", "address_2": null, "city": "Southside", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43609", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 41.6310788, "longitude": -83.5636768}, "phones": [{"number": "(419) 242-1545", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:30", "closes_at": "16:15"}]}
